discourse_list.title: SES Weekly Status Update: Ecosystem Performance API & Dashboard Update

content.content: 960×540 226 KB   This Week’s Topic: Ecosystem Performance API & Dashboard  Join us here! on 2022-03-11T15:30:00Z  MakerDAO SES is hosting a status update on the Ecosystem Performance API & Dashboard initiative this Friday. Our update will explore the need for this tool based on conversations we’ve had with diverse stakeholders across the DAO. We will also discuss the conceptual design of the data model, and how it will be implemented to create an openly available API for unlocking further actionable insights from the data Core Units produce.  @Jack & @Haiku will present. Add the SES Status Update Call to your calendar  Other Updates  960×540 55.2 KB   Incubator News  960×540 63.8 KB   The proposed Lending Oversight Core Unit hosted their Core Unit Overview call last week on the SES Status Update. The Real-world Asset restructuring initiative introduces the incubation of the Legal & Transaction Services Core Unit. This is a proposed Core Unit that will support the legal elements of structured finance deals involving RWAs. The LTS team is gearing up to present their Core Unit Overview to the community in the coming weeks.   OKR #1 - Incubation Program Restructuring Update  960×540 113 KB   MakerDAO SES is calling on the community to contribute ideas to a list of Core Units the DAO needs next. The post for discussions can be found here.   OKR #3 - Ecosystem Performance API & Dashboard Update  960×540 42.4 KB   This week’s SES Spotlight topic is a deep dive into the Ecosystem Performance API & Dashboard Update. Join us here🔗 2022-03-11T15:30:00Z.   With the Community!  960×540 33.1 KB   16.03 Collateral Onboarding Call #39: D3M for Notional Finance Add to your calendar!  16.03 Focus On #6: Data Insights Core Unit Update Add to your calendar!  Contacts  960×540 56.3 KB   Links  Discord Drive Notion   @ses-core-unit
Excited for this. let’s go legal resiliency!
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
